summary: Nick Broomfield digs into the case of the notorious serial killer known as the Grim Sleeper, who terrorized South Central Los Angeles over a span of twenty-five years.
cast: Nick Broomfield|Lonnie David Franklin Jr.|Donna|Steve|Gary|Richard|Seymour Amster|Laverne Peters|Margaret Prescod|Pam Brooks|Diana Ware|Liz|DelaShawn|Jerry|Nana Gyamfi|Roxanne|Dion Browning|Lili|Fernando|Enietra Washington|Antonio Villaraigosa|Charlie Beck|Dennis Kilcoyne|Chris Franklin|Mikey|Cookie
director: Directors: Nick Broomfield, Barney Broomfield (co-director) | 1 more credit Â»
title: Tales of the Grim Sleeper
